title: Create Venue Content Type
description: Create a Venue content type in Strapi with fields: name (string, required), address (text), website (string), neighborhood (string). This represents venues where gigs take place.

title: Create simple todo frontend backed by CMS
description: Build a todo application with Strapi as backend and Astro as frontend. Includes: 1) Create todo content type in Strapi with fields (title, description, completed status), 2) Set up API endpoints, 3) Build Astro frontend with list/create/update/delete functionality

title: Create Gig Content Type
description: Create a Gig content type in Strapi with fields: title (string, required), date (datetime, required), time_display (string for display like '21:00'), price (string like 'Free' or 'â‚¬10'), description (text), venue (relation to Venue, many-to-one). This represents individual gig events.

title: Install Tailwind CSS in Astro
description: Ensure Tailwind CSS is properly configured in the Astro frontend (apps/web). Verify the setup works with a test component.

title: Fetch and Display Gigs
description: Create an Astro page that fetches gigs from Strapi API (http://localhost:1337/api/gigs?populate=venue&sort=date:asc) and displays them as a basic list. Filter to only show future gigs (date >= today).

title: Rename site to Athens Ears
description: Change all references from 'Athens Gigs' to 'Athens Ears' including page title, header, and meta description.

title: Configure Strapi API Permissions
description: Configure Strapi's Users & Permissions plugin to allow public (unauthenticated) read access to Venues and Gigs. Enable find and findOne actions for the Public role on both content types.

title: Add Sample Data
description: Add sample data to Strapi via the admin panel or seed script: 3-5 venues (real Athens venues like Six Dogs, Romantso, etc.) and 8-10 gigs across different dates in the current and next month to test the display.

title: Remove time from gig display
description: Remove the time display next to the date in gig listings - only show date and other info.

title: Format Gig Display
description: Format each gig entry to show: date (day of week, day number), time, title, venue name (linked to venue website if available), price. Use clean typography and spacing.

title: Final Styling and Polish
description: Apply final styling: consistent color scheme, hover states, responsive design for mobile/tablet/desktop, proper spacing and typography. Ensure the site looks clean and professional.

title: Remove year from month headers
description: Month headers currently show 'January 2026' - remove the year and just show 'January'.

title: Implement Month Grouping
description: Group gigs by month on the homepage. Display month headers (e.g., 'January 2026', 'February 2026') with gigs listed under their respective months in chronological order.

title: Add .gitignore file
description: Create root .gitignore file to exclude node_modules, build outputs, env files, and other common patterns for pnpm monorepo with Strapi and Astro

title: Create Homepage Layout
description: Create a basic homepage layout in Astro with: header section with 'Athens Gigs' title, main content area for gig listings, basic responsive container structure using Tailwind CSS.
